FuncDef: Configures a destination MAC address or range to be used as a Service Ingress QoS policy match criterion.

ParaDef.Info: The MAC address to be used as a match criterion. Values-HH:HH:HH:HH:HH:HH or HH-HH-HH-HH-HH-HH where H is a hexadecimal digit.
A 48-bit mask to match a range of MAC address values. Values-0x00000000000000 to 0xFFFFFFFFFFFF (hex). ParamDefault: Default- 0xFFFFFFFFFFFF
